changeSet.author: Ahmed.Baz
changeSet.sql: create table courses ( id int8 primary key, title varchar(200) not null, description varchar(500), number_of_hours int4 not null, start_at timestamp, instructor_id int8 not null, created_at timestamp, created_by int8, last_modified_at timestamp, last_modified_by int8, deleted_at timestamp, deleted_by int8, constraint course_instructor_fk foreign key (instructor_id) references users (id) );
create sequence courses_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 9999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 cache 20;
